IMPLS :: at this shite you can find, public domain sheet music (you can free download them too) :: https://imslp.org/wiki/Main_Page

Hello, i am the Developer of this application, i hope that serves you well. My name is Nicos Sarado, i am a Software Engineer at the day and a Jazz musician when the night falls. 
 	 The goal of this Video Library, is to contain the ancient knowledge of the Jazz Masters, for you to internalise it and become their living embodiment. 
 	 So learn my child' learn every day and every waking hour, practise and try harder' with all your will and heart and soul' to climp towards the snowy peaks of the unspeakable truth, and when you reach there, let her blaze your heart gently, and cary this flame back to us and to the physical world. 
 	 Because people' are in need of this Music, and because Music is in need of your love today.
